statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;

UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='john.doe@example.com', address='123 Main St' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_attributes SET attribute_value = 'admin' WHERE attribute_key = 'role';
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='new_email@example.com', full_name='John Doe' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE user_attributes SET attribute_value='new_value' WHERE attribute_key='attribute_key' AND user_id=101;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='test@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE user_attributes SET attribute_value='Admin' WHERE user_id=2 AND attribute_name='role';
UPDATE user_profiles SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_attributes SET attribute_value = 'Admin' WHERE attribute_name = 'role' AND user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', password='newpassword123' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE profiles SET bio='Updated bio.', date_of_birth='1990-05-15' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', username='newusername' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE profiles SET bio='Updated bio text', date_of_birth='1990-01-01' WHERE user_id=456;
UPDATE UserProfile SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE UserConnections SET connection_timestamp = current_timestamp WHERE connection_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE UserProfile SET email='new_email@example.com', username='new_username' WHERE user_id='5fbc2b61-169e-4a46-a73d-ebf1024764e1';
UPDATE UserActivity SET activity_type='login', activity_timestamp='2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id='6d5f5a32-f854-4cc0-962b-bce3b177e9e6';
